abstract_summ: Traditional Chinese medicine has recommended the use of liquorice (Glycyrrhiza species) in the treatment of infections caused by SARS-CoV-2 . The core structure of these potential hits can be used for further lead optimization to design drugs for SARS COV2 . Phytochemicals such as 7-deacetyl-7-benzoylgedunin, epoxyazadiradione, limonin, maslinic acid, glycyrhizic acid and ursolic acid were found to be effective against the target proteins .
